Hi,

I am using H3 and currenty I am struggling with a crawl which doesn't =
get completed as I'd like it to complete. The crawl gets paused with a lot =
of retired queues which don't get crawled. 

As far as I understand retirem=
ent is a feature which has to do with the general crawl-policy when each do=
main/queue gets crawled. 

To disable the budget-feature I already enable t=
he ZeroCostAssignmentPolicy and set "hold-queues" of the frontier to "false=
". I thought that this way no retirement happens. But so far, the retiremen=
t still happens.

Do you have any hints or ideas how I could disable this r=
etirement behaviour? Or how I could reactivate those retired queues? I'd pr=
efer the first variant so my crawls get crawled completeley. 

Cheers,
Tino=
